subject: Here is another tax collect
body:
Here is another tax collector’s receiver’s bank detail.
(1) Bank Name; First Bank of Nigeria LTD. 
(2) Account Name; O. I. S.
(3) Account Number; 204280XXXX
(4) Swift Code; FBNINGLA. 
(5) Sort Code; 011157968. 
(6) Bank Address; 35 Samuel Asabia House Marina Lagos Nigeria. 
(7) Purpose of payment. For assistance 
I wait for your urgent respond also send me your full details. 
Sincerely, 
Mrs. Janet Olisa   
(Director Of Ministry Of Foreign Payments) MINISTRY OF FOREIGN  
AFFAIRS, HEADQUATERS - ABUJA

subject: Re:    Here is another tax collect
body:
Hello Mrs. Janet Olisa,

Thank you for sharing the bank details with me. I appreciate your willingness to assist. However, before proceeding, I would like to know more about the purpose of this payment. Could you please provide me with some additional information regarding the assistance you mentioned?

Also, I'm curious to know how you came across my contact information. It's always interesting to understand how these connections are made.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Jose

subject: From Ministry of Foreign Payments to Gary
body:
The Content of your mail is well noted. I want you to know I understand that you have been through a lot in trying to receive this Fund. I want you to know that your time has come and you have been remembered.

 Like I told you in my mail since you are not here present you will only be required $1,750 for Court affidavit of claim of Fund Certificate.

Also, I will advise you to stop further communication with anyone here except this Office because as soon as you have made this Payment, I will direct you to that paying bank that will transfer your fund and also. I will give all details to you in fact an Online Account will be set up for you by the paying bank or bank to bank transfer / ATM Card payment as you decide to receive your fund..

I will advise you to get back to me so that I will get you details for this payment.

I look forward to your response.

Yours faithfully
Mrs. Janet Olisa
(Director Of Ministry Of Foreign Payments)MINISTRY OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, HEADQUARTERS - ABUJA

Hello Mrs. Janet Olisa,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your concerns about the trustworthiness of certain individuals claiming to be in positions of authority. I understand that there are many scams out there, and it can be difficult to differentiate between genuine opportunities and fraudulent schemes.

I appreciate your offer to guide me through the release of my payment. Can you please provide more information about the process? How exactly would you assist me in ensuring that my funds are delivered safely? Additionally, could you clarify what you mean by "the only person who will deliver me from this long suffering"?

I want to make sure that I fully understand the situation before making any decisions. Thank you for your understanding.
Best wishes,
Gary

subject: Re: From Ministry of Foreign Payments to Gary
body:
Hello Gary,

Thank you for your response. I understand your concerns about scams and fraudulent schemes. Rest assured, I am here to assist you in ensuring the safe delivery of your funds.

To begin the process, we will require a Court affidavit of claim of Fund from you. This is a legal document that will establish your rightful ownership of the funds. Once this is obtained, I will provide you with all the necessary details for making the payment.

As for being the only person who can deliver you from this long suffering, what I meant is that I have the authority and expertise to guide you through the entire process and ensure that your funds are released to you without any further delays or complications.

Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns. I am here to help.

Best regards,
Mrs.

Best wishes,
Gary

subject: Attention: Rebecca. Your Recovered Funds
body:
Attention:  Rebecca.


Sometimes i do wonder if you are really, really with yourself. How could you keep trusting people and at the end you will lose your hard-earned money, or are you being deceived by their big names? they impersonate on many offices, claiming to be Governors, Director/ Chairmen of one office or the other.


Their game plan is only just to extort your hard-earned money. Now, the question is how long will you continue to be deceived? Sometimes ,they will issue you fake check, ATM CARD, introduce you to fake diplomatic delivery, UN-existing on-line banking and they will also fake wire transfer of your fund with payment stop order.


Anyway, the virtue of my position, i have been following this transaction from inception and all your efforts towards realizing the fund. More often than not,  it is very unfortunate that at the end you lose. Also using someone came to their office to claim your fund or you authorized someone as your representative to draw your attention.


Although, i don't blame you because you are not here to witness the processing of your payment. The problem here is that you've never been told the whole truth about this transaction and it is because of this truth they decided to extort you, the keeping collecting money from you.


The most annoying part is even fraudsters have really taken advantage of this opportunity to enrich themselves at your expense; those you feel are assisting or working for you are your main problems.


I know the truth surrounding this payment and i am the only person who will deliver you from this long suffering if you will abide by my advice .Please i beseech you to stop pursuit of shadows and being deceived. Feel free to contact me immediately you receive this mail so that I can explain to you the modus-operandi guiding the release of your payment. Do not panic or have fear for anything, i know you have gone through hell but time has come to reap.


Furthermore, all i need from you is trust, just give me the trust all your information is here with me, because i have work in UN office for over 8 years both in Africa and UK and there is no means of receiving payment that cost anything except Court affidavit of claim of fund certificate if the owner is not there in person, which will not cost more than $1, 750 USD.


In addition, all the fees they ask both transfer cost or delivering cost, clearance certificates known of them exist. If you really want us to proceed, send me your direct contact or you ignore my letter if you are not interested.


I must to be truthful and straightforward to you. Truth is bitter but I will always live with it since I was brought up with it. Think twice and have a change of mind so that you will archive our aim. I will give you more details as soon as i get your respond.


Sincerely,


Mrs. Janet Olisa


(Director Of Ministry Of Foreign Payments) MINISTRY OF FOREIGN

AFFAIRS, HEADQUATERS – ABUJA.

subject: Re: Attention: Rebecca. Your Recovered Funds
body:
Hello Mrs. Janet Olisa,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I must admit, it's quite a lot to take in. It seems like there are many things happening that I wasn't aware of.

You mentioned something about fake checks, ATM cards, and wire transfers. Could you please elaborate more on these? How can one identify if they're fake or not?

Also, you talked about people claiming to be Governors or Directors. That sounds very serious! How does one verify the authenticity of such individuals?

I'm also curious about the process you mentioned - the one that I'm not here to witness. Could you explain what this process involves?

Lastly, you mentioned a fee for a Court affidavit of claim of fund. Is this a standard procedure? And why would it only apply if the owner is not present?

I appreciate your help and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: Attention: Rebecca. Your Recovered Funds
body:
Good Evening Rebecca.



The Content of your mail is well noted. I want you to know I understand that you have been through a lot in trying to receive this Fund. I want you to know that your time has come and you have been remembered.



Like I told you in my mail since you are not here present you will only be required $1,750 for Court affidavit of claim of Fund Certificate. Try all your possible best as human to pay these only costs and you will achieve your aim without be disappointed.



Also I will advise you to stop further communication with anyone here except this Office because as soon as you have made this Payment I will direct you to the paying bank that will transfer your fund to you in fact an Online Account will be set up for you by the paying bank or Bank to Bank transfer as you prefer.



I will advise you to get back to me so that I will get you details for this payment.



Sincerely,



Mrs. Janet Olisa



(Director Of Ministry Of Foreign Payments) MINISTRY OF FOREIGN

AFFAIRS, HEADQUATERS – ABUJA.

subject: Re: Attention: Rebecca. Your Recovered Funds
body:
Hello Mrs. Janet Olisa,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's really exciting to hear that my time has come! I'm a bit confused about the Court affidavit of claim of Fund, could you please explain more about this? 

Also, you mentioned some costs that need to be paid. Could you provide more details on what these costs are for and how they will be used? 

I appreciate your advice on dealing only with this Office. It makes me feel secure knowing that there is a dedicated team handling my case.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: Attention: Rebecca. Your Recovered Funds
body:
Good Evening Rebecca.



The Content of your mail is well noted. I want you to know I understand that you only paying for Court affidavit of claim of Fund Certificate since you are not here present to obtain it from high court here.



Court affidavit is a sworn written document which our legal attorney will stand on your favor to obtain it on your behalf.



Sincerely,



Mrs. Janet Olisa



(Director Of Ministry Of Foreign Payments) MINISTRY OF FOREIGN

AFFAIRS, HEADQUATERS – ABUJA.

subject: Re: Attention: Rebecca. Your Recovered Funds
body:
Good evening Mrs. Janet Olisa,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your efforts in helping me understand the process better.

If I may ask, could you please elaborate more on what exactly this Court affidavit of claim of Fund is? And why is it necessary for me to pay for it since I am not present there?

Also, could you kindly provide more information about the role of the legal attorney in this process? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rebecca
